title: Three legacy Battlefield games will be removed from online stores in April
description: It's your last chance to purchase Bad Company's single-player campaign.

title: Here’s the full analysis of newly uncovered genetic data on COVID’s origins
description: The genetic data paints a picture of spillover in one zone of the market.

title: Newegg’s unique NAS configurator is a handy, but limited, shopping tool
description: You can only shop Newegg inventory, but it gets the ball rolling.

title: Hackers drain bitcoin ATMs of $1.5 million by exploiting 0-day bug
description: Don't store digital coins in hot wallets! It's great advice but can't always be followed.

title: Judge dismisses gamers’ claims that Microsoft/Activision merger will spoil gaming
description: Gamers have 20 days to supply more evidence showing the merger would harm them.

title: New VLT data reveals more about aftermath of DART vs. asteroid collision
description: Two new papers shed light on debris cloud, altered surface of Dimorphos asteroid.

title: Amazon layoffs will shut down camera review site DPReview.com after 25 years
description: Updates stop on April 10, site will be available for "a limited period" after.

title: Google defends auto-deletion of chats after US alleged it destroyed evidence
description: Despite deleted chats, Google says US wasn't denied access to "material" info.

title: Google says late Pixel Watch alarms will be fixed “in the coming weeks”
description: Overly aggressive power savings is probably to blame for the late alarm feature.

title: AI-faked images of Donald Trump’s imagined arrest swirl on Twitter
description: Platforms have begun relying on users to clearly disclose AI-generated media.

title: The 2023 Dodge Challenger SRT Demon 170 will do 0-60 in just 1.66 seconds
description: Dodge is seeing out the Hemi V8 muscle car era with a 1,025 hp version.

title: New method gets better performance out of atomically thin transistors
description: A new way of making wafer-scale electronics out of atomically thin sheets.

title: The 2023 BMW XM is purpose-built to get your attention
description: The XM is a technical powerhouse geared for eating autobahns, not apices.

title: Bing’s AI chatbot can now generate unhinged images along with unhinged text
description: "Advanced" version of OpenAI's DALL-E will roll out to Bing preview users.

title: Google’s answer to ChatGPT, Google Bard, is out
description: Google's "experimental" answer to Bing is finally ready, and you can join the waitlist.

title: Antisemitism on Twitter has more than doubled since Elon Musk took over
description: Musk's decision to roll back content moderation is partly to blame.

title: Kazakhstan’s seizure of Russian space assets threatens the Soyuz-5 rocket
description: Russia has spent nearly $1 billion on the development of the new Soyuz-5 rocket.

title: The Genesis GV70 Electrified humbly sticks to its strengths
description: With its latest, Genesis is one step closer to putting ICE in its rearview mirror.

title: Are Roblox’s new AI coding and art tools the future of game development?
description: New initiative aims to take game development past "the hands of the skilled few."
